If secure is set to true then it will cause the cookie to be set only when SSL-enabled (HTTPS) is used, and otherwise it won't set a cookie. 'true' is recommended yet it requires the above mentioned pre-requisite.

 
    secure: false,
¶

Only set the maxAge to null if the cookie shouldn't be expired at all. The cookie will expunge when the browser is closed.

 
    maxAge: null
